sentences.en: An undisturbed object continues to move uniformly in a straight line.
sentences.cn: 未受干扰的物体继续沿直线匀速前进.

sentences.en: At last I was able to work undisturbed.
sentences.cn: 我终于可以安安静静地工作了。

sentences.en: I can spend the whole day undisturbed at the warehouse.
sentences.cn: 我可以一整天都呆在仓库里而不受打扰。

sentences.en: In the Balearics pockets of rural life and inland villages are undisturbed.
sentences.cn: 在巴利阿里群岛上，零星散布在岛内的村庄和那里的生活平静而祥和。

sentences.en: In undisturbed inertial motion, the angular momentum is constant.
sentences.cn: 在无扰动惯性运动中, 角动量是恒定的.

sentences.en: Peonies react badly to being moved and are best left undisturbed.
sentences.cn: 牡丹花不宜挪移，最好别去动它。
那张桌子看上去没人动过。

sentences.en: The treasure had lain undisturbed for centuries.
sentences.cn: 那份珍宝安然无恙地存放了几个世纪。

sentences.en: The village is changing but it is still undisturbed.
sentences.cn: 村庄在发生变化但依旧宁静.

sentences.en: The war had not left Bargate undisturbed.
sentences.cn: 巴盖特古城门未能躲过战火的荼毒。

sentences.en: There was a small restaurant on Sullivan Street where we could talk undisturbed.
sentences.cn: 沙利文大街上有一家小餐馆，我们可以在那里不受打扰地聊。

sentences.en: These goals are not limited to undisturbed natural areas.
sentences.cn: 这些目标并不仅限于那些尚未开发的自然区.

sentences.en: They live as we all should live -- undisturbed , indifferent, and without disquiet.
sentences.cn: 他们过的才是理想的日子呐 -- 静谧, 淡漠 、 安宁.
他们想不受打扰地好好休息一下。

sentences.en: You can lead a life of undisturbed peace ever afterwards.
sentences.cn: 你今后能安安静静地过日子,无人登门打扰.

phrases.tran_cn: 原状土；原壮土；未扰动土

trans.tran_cn: 未被打搅的，泰然自若的，镇静的，未扰动
